resources.string: You will be presented a few words in different languages. Identify the colour of each word and press the sufficient button as soon as you can. After a short testing sequence of words in Klingon, Elvish and Dothraki a real test starts. Do the same as you did in testing sequence and I will try to guess your mother tongue. Enjoy my App!
Thank you for reference test. Your average time is %1$.3f seconds.%nYour answers were correct in %2$.1f per cent of times.
Would you like to proceed with the StroopSpy test?
